About

Hi there, my name is Emma. That in the picture is me with my husband and our little boy, David.

My husband and I decided to start this site when more and more of our friends started complaining about their marriage. They were obviously unhappy, and we wanted to help them.

We saw that this is not a problem unique to our community – more and more people are falling out of love and getting divorced. There is so much sadness and pain in divorce, and we wanted to let people know that there is another way. So we started the site in the hopes that people will be able to benefit from it.

As time went on and our little boy started demanding his own bit of attention, I realized that marriages aren’t the only area lacking in love- parent/child issues seem to be on the rise too! So the “Parenting” section was added and a whole new world of things to learn unfolded.

If even one couple can turn their relationship around, or one parent can build a really strong bond with their child,  it would have been worth it.

We got married in 2009 so it’s been nearly 4  years as I’m writing this. It may not seem like much, but we’ve been learning everything we can about relationships and the results speak for themselves. There is a lot of work involved but I promise you it’s worth it.

I’m sure there is still a lot for us to learn though!! We hope to share our findings with you as we go along, so we can all benefit from happier, more satisfying relationships.

Love to you all,

Emma
